DOC.brief_summary: The purpose randomize clinical trial compare effect moderate versus high intensity exercise training physical fitness physical function patient type 2 diabetes . The research hypothesis high intensity exercise training superior moderate intensity outcome individual type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Exercise Training Intensity Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: All participant meet American Diabetes Association diagnostic criterion type 2 diabetes . A physician must consider participant medically stable participate investigation . Any individual history medical condition identify American Heart Association absolute contraindication exercise test exclude study . Any individual angina ( stable unstable ) , uncontrolled hypertension , proliferative retinopathy , severe peripheral neuropathy , nephropathy , autonomic neuropathy , history coronary artery disease , history myocardial infarction , unable participate study due physical impairment exclude investigation . Any individual involved resistance training aerobic training within 3 month begin investigation exclude .
